value.title: Fill up/ down with conditions in Power Query

I am going to show you two ways to do it, you pick the one need :)  Chapters 00:00 Intro 01:00 First solution using M language 02:50 Second solution using the UI Done! In todays video I will show you can you can add annotations to charts automatically
